mapper.insert: insert into bookmark (book_no, user_no, type, b_addr, b_post) values (bookmark_seq.nextval, #{user_no}, #{type}, #{b_addr}, #{b_post})
mapper.update: update bookmark set b_addr = #{b_addr}, b_post = #{b_post} where type = #{type} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.delete: update bookmark set b_addr = null, b_post = null where book_no = #{book_no} and user_no = #{user_no} and type = #{type}
